reviewText: Applies ONLY to Italian release ASIN: B00E4UFTX0 I'm sorry, but unfortunately, PQ is just about the same as that of a VHS copy on a 46" screen (with upscaling). There seems to be another Korean edition of this film (aspect ratio?? PQ??)  The Reincarnation of Peter Proud [ All Region NTSC Korean Import ] (1975)
